file_content.text: Looks like Rist isn't happy about you going back on your contract.
Those are Rist colors. I told you to take the deal.
Rist sent someone to see you off. Hope she's packing a paycheck instead of a vibroblade.
Rist flunky dead ahead. Better watch your back.
The Girards are dead. You have my pay?
Of course, House Rist sends their thanks for your assistance in this matter.
You looking for trouble?
No need to be alarmed. I'm only here to deliver a message.
While House Rist regrets that you decided to renig on our agreement, it makes no real difference in the end.
It is unfortunate that our individual arrangements had us at odds earlier, but that's simply the nature of our business.
My master wishes to ensure that there is no ill will left between us.
Steer clear of me and we won't have any problems.
Just stay out of my way.
That is acceptable.
Since you asked so nicely, I'll consider it.
No hard feelings.
Please do, hostilities between us would be an unnecessary expense for everyone involved.
I don't know, I can be real temperamental... I find credits help lighten my mood.
Good will's pricey.
My master anticipated this. Please accept a peace offering.
House Rist will no longer interfere with your affairs, news Tarro Blood will not take graciously I'm sure. He fronted a considerable sum to ensure his rivals were dealt with.
I imagine he'll threaten some reprisal, but I think we both know what Tarro Blood's word is worth.
